whisper-as.title: Whisper As
whisper-as.gmOnlyHint: If enabled, the dialog will only be shown for Gamemasters. Otherwise all players may use the dialog.
whisper-as.gmOnlyAliasHint: If enabled, only Gamemasters can enter a custom alias. Otherwise all Trusted Players may use a custom alias.
whisper-as.defaultToCharacterHint: If enabled, the dialog will default to whispering in-character as selected token. Otherwise the dialog will default to whispering out-of-character.
whisper-as.activePlayersOnlyHint: If enabled, the dialog will only show players currently in the session as whisper targets. Otherwise all players in the world will be shown.
whisper-as.currentSceneTokensOnlyHint: If enabled, the dialog will only show tokens currently in the active scene as whisper aliases. Otherwise all owned tokens in the world will be shown.
whisper-as.warnIfNoRecipientsHint: If enabled, a confirmation dialog will be shown if you do not select any recipients. Otherwise your message will be posted for all players (i.e. not whispered).
whisper-as.noRecipientsContent: No recipients selected. Send to all?
